title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers to chat, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library exposing chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations for local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and chat models for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, multi-user support, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic Ruby client for Ollama chat, generate, pull, and embed operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-style code completions and chat.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for querying Ollama models inside the editor with customizable prompts and streaming responses.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x generator component enabling Ollama models in production-ready RAG and agent pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent volume support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized with one-liner docker run commands.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of Modelfile definitions maintained by Ollama for Llama 3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Phi-3, etc.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that streams responses from a local Ollama backend using the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming, chat, and embedding support; distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models for chat and embeddings with admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice that proxies and extends Ollama with rate-limiting, auth, and usage metrics.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models for generative steps in workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs with slash-command support.
